analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x22e60a10ed901abb6f13adfaf91e3da98867d415.sol:
	Contract Ldohtoken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x22e60a10ed901abb6f13adfaf91e3da98867d415.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x22e60a10ed901abb6f13adfaf91e3da98867d415.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
